description: Detects program executions in suspicious non-program folders related to malware or hacking activity
name: Program Executions in Suspicious Folders
query: (type:"SYSCALL" AND exe:(\/tmp\/* OR \/var\/www\/* OR \/home\/*\/public_html\/* OR \/usr\/local\/apache2\/* OR \/usr\/local\/httpd\/* OR \/var\/apache\/* OR \/srv\/www\/* OR \/home\/httpd\/html\/* OR \/srv\/http\/* OR \/usr\/share\/nginx\/html\/* OR \/var\/lib\/pgsql\/data\/* OR \/usr\/local\/mysql\/data\/* OR \/var\/lib\/mysql\/* OR \/var\/vsftpd\/* OR \/etc\/bind\/* OR \/var\/named\/*))
author: Florian Roth
